jpo
Class HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer

java.lang.Object
  jpo.HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer
Enclosing class:
HtmlDistillerThread
class HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

Inner class that keeps a buffer of the picture descriptions and will output a table row with the buffered descriptions when the buffer has reached it's limit.

Field Summary
(package private)  int columns
          The number of columns on the Thumbnail page.
(package private)  java.lang.String[] descriptions
          An array holding the strings of the pictures.
(package private)  java.io.BufferedWriter out
          The HTML page for the Thumbnails.
(package private)  int picCounter
          A counter variable.

putCheckFlush

public void putCheckFlush(java.lang.String description)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Adds the supplied string to the buffer and performs a check whether the buffer is full If the buffer is full it flushes it.

Parameters:
description - The String to be added.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if anything went wrong with the writing.

flushIfNescessary

public void flushIfNescessary()
                       throws java.io.IOException
Checks whether the buffer is full and if so will terminate the current line, flush the buffer and start a new line.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if something went wrong with wrting.

flushDescriptions

public void flushDescriptions()
                       throws java.io.IOException
method that writes the descriptions[] array to the html file. as each pictures's img tag was written to the file the description was kept in an array. This method is called each time the row of img is full. The method is also called when the last picture has been written. The array elements are set to null after writing so that the last row can determine when to stop writing the pictures (the row can of course be incomplete).

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If writing didn't work.
